channel.title: About Me on Lindsay Kislingbury
channel.description: Recent content in About Me on Lindsay Kislingbury

item.description:
Professional Summary

Senior Computer Science student and Full Stack Engineer with end-to-end experience architecting cloud-native web applications. Specializes in building high-reliability systems using C#, .NET 9, and Azure, while delivering complex user interfaces with Vue.js 3. Passionate about Open Source and Privacy, with a focus on building scalable, production-grade infrastructure from the ground up.

Technical Skills

  • Frontend: Vue.js 3 (Composition API) Pinia Tiptap TypeScript JavaScript
  • Backend: C# .NET 9 ASP.NET Core Entity Framework Core SQL Python
  • Cloud & Infra: Azure (App Service, SQL, Service Bus) GitHub Actions Docker Linux
  • Testing & Concepts: xUnit PyTest RESTful APIs CI/CD MVC Architecture

Experience

Full Stack Software Engineer

Bytewish Foundation | Feb. 2024 â€“ Present
